donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: Joint Programme Outcome(s): Improved and expanded equitable access to quality basic health services for all through the deployment of medical personnel as volunteers. This will also strengthen capacity to sustain universal access to HIV prevention, treatment, care and support. International volunteer specialists will be placed in different health facilities in Lesotho to provide improved medical services to the local population and to build local capacity to ensure the continued delivery of quality medical care after the International UNV volunteer placement has ended.

project_descr: Joint Programme Outcome is to improved and expanded equitable access to quality basic health services for all through the deployment of medical personnel as volunteers.
